coding_practice.title: Sort Array By Parity
coding_practice.description:
Given an integer array nums, move all the even integers at the beginning of the array followed by all the odd integers.

Return any array that satisfies this condition.

examples.explanation: The outputs [4,2,3,1], [2,4,1,3], and [4,2,1,3] would also be accepted.

coding_practice.explanation:
1. 使用列表生成式，先將所有偶數加入結果列表。
2. 再將所有奇數加入結果列表。
3. 返回合併後的列表，即偶數在前，奇數在後。
